description: Non material amendment to planning permission ref. P2015/4922/FUL dated 9 September 2016 for the erection of a part three, four and five storey building plus basement comprising 4,233 sq m (GIA) of B1 (business) floorspace.  The proposed amendments include omission of the sub-basement, revisions to the White Lion Street elevation and internal reconfiguration.
decision_conditions:
Condition 2 of planning permission reference P2015/4922/FUL is amended as follows:

CONDITION:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 21567-07-099 D GA Basement Level; 21567-07-100 D GA Ground Floor; 21567-07-101 D GA First Floor; 21567-07-102 D GA Second Floor; 21567-07-103 D GA Third Floor; 21567-07-104 D GA Fourth Floor; 21567-07-105 D GA Roof; 21567-07-200 D GA Proposed Sections AA & BB; 21567-07-201 D GA Proposed Sections CC & DD; 21567-07-202 D GA Proposed Sections EE & FF; 21567-07-203 D GA Proposed Section GG; 21567-07-301 D GA Proposed South Elevation; 21567-07-302 D GA Proposed White Lion Street Elevation; Design, Access and Heritage Statement; Daylight and Sunlight Report; Transport Statement; Construction Management Plan; Sustainable Design and Construction Statement; Archaeology Assessment.
REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
